post:
Hello Everyone,

We're back with another interesting offer which is based in **Clifton, New Jersey!**

We've moved out of NYC successfully into our new datacenter in Clifton, New Jersey this move provides us the perfect opportunity to expand our current services without anybody holding us back unlike some of the issues we faced previously. We have a bigger and far better network in terms of quality and the "Cleanness" which is something were very impressed to be offering our clients. So as of now we would like to welcome you to our new home on the East Coast with some **super special offers** ;)

We're back **BIGGER** and **BETTER** than ever before with a whole new lineup for the next 2 weeks only!


-----------------------------
**2 WEEKS OF SPECAILS**

------------

**$8.49/YEAR 128 YEARLY** | COUPON: W15  [**ORDER HERE**](http://www.dedicatedminds.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=9)

- 2 Cores | 128MB RAM Guaranteed  | 12GB Storage (RAID10) | 300GB BW @ 1Gbps | 1 IPv4

- 4 Cores | 2GB Guaranteed RAM | 60GB Storage (RAID10) | 1TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps | 2 IPv4

- 4 Cores | 3GB Guaranteed RAM | 45GB Storage (RAID10) | 1TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps | 2 IPv4 

------------------

###About Dedicated Minds

We're now ready to show Dedicated Minds to the world of Start-up's and Developers with a wide variety of services to help them along the way.
